author: neilg
msg: make some constants final; these should always have been final, so even were it not for static mutability concerns this would be a clear bugfix.

author: neilg
msg: statib mutability updates.  Make a few variables private that do not need public visibility.

author: neilg
msg: addressing static mutability issues in XSAttributeChecker.  Since this new implementation, where XSDWildcardTraverser can rely on getting fresh objects from XSAttributeChecker also saves some copying, it stands some chance of actually being more efficient than the old approach.

author: neilg
msg: since there have been no loud cries in protest, modifying the static kidOk array in the DOM CoreDocumentImpl to address static mutability issues.
